DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate pain intensity over 8 weeks in acupuncture patients with chronic low back pain and to compare 2 different groups of patients which differ in the acupuncture method used to treat the pain.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Different Acupuncture Methods for Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of chronic low back pain (for at least 3 months) confirmed by a consultant indication for treatment of low back pain with acupuncture confirmed by a consultant at least 40 mm on a VAS pain scale acupuncture during the last 6 months start of a new therapy for low back pain within the last 4 weeks pregnancy substance or drug abuse
